one_reviews_text: Basically a waste of money. VR ready PC does not recognise Oculus Quest 2 as being connected - via USB C port which tests ok with mem stick.  Does not recognise headset being connected via working USB 3.0 port with C-A adapter. Get the genuine article they said :(  no Steam yet. Virtual Desktop sideloaded to Sidequest isnt recognising the headset on the wireless network either. Painful process to go through, especially trawling forums for fixes, which this cable was supposed to mitgate.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on November 7, 2020

one_reviews_text: El producto está bien, ajusta mejor que la correa elástica que viene incluida y es rápido y cómodo de utilizar. Mejora la experiencia de usuario al quedar las gafas más fijas y reduce la pérdida de nitidez que a veces se experimenta con la correa elástica.Pero... lamentablemente se ha roto una de las patas al poco tiempo. No han sufrido ningún golpe, caída ni forcejeo. Debe ser que no soporta bien la tensión a la que es sometida.Una pena, porque estaba contento con el producto.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on April 2, 2021
review_title: Se han roto al poco tiempo

one_reviews_text: Es un excelente añadido. Ojalá fuera configuración por default del Quest 2, para no tener que comprar más, pero finalmente comprarlo vale mucho la pena. Añade la comodidad del Rift s al Quest 2 y la mejora aún más. Es muy sencillo de instalar. Simplemente retirar el anterior y aplicar el nuevo con presión, nada difícil. En cualquier momento puedes cambiarlo fácilmente. Vale la pena. Posiblemente lo pudieron haber echo más barato, pero si vas a jugar mucho es un agregado que debes tener.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on October 16, 2020
review_title: Añade la comodidad del Rift S al Quest 2

one_reviews_text: Aparentemente um produto porreiro, mas após 25 horas uso (33 dias depois da compra), descubro uma estaladela do lado esquerdo.Infelizmente passou o prazo de devolução em 3 dias, senão tinha devolvido.Para minha surpresa após um pesquisa na internet, muitos utilizadores têm o mesmo problema, mas que acabou por partir. Certamente que se utilizar uma vez mais, a faixa vai partir também.Muito desapontado por ser um produto oficial da Oculus e para não falar que não foi barato (50 EUR).Mandei pedido de suporte para a Oculus, e agora estou a espera de resposta. Não faz sentido um produto destes partir com tão pouco uso, e também não faz sentido estar a comprar uma faixa todos os meses.Não recomendo.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on June 17, 2021
review_title: Estalou na lateral esquerda após 25 horas de uso

one_reviews_text: 購入して1月程度ですが、大した負荷をかけたわけでもなく普段使いでバリッと真っ二つに割れました。　ネットでも割れたという報告が上がっている様ですが、メーカーは回収しないのは何故と思ってしまうほど豆腐の様な強度です。
review_date: Reviewed in Japan on November 11, 2020
review_title: 製品の強度が豆腐なみ

one_reviews_text: Un articolo da avere a tutti i costi se si vuole godere a pieno dell'esperienza di oculus quest 2. Gli elastici il dotazione sono molto fastidiosi ma con questo upgrade si può usufruire del quest 2 senza pericolo di movimenti involontari o senza star li a manovrare i tanto scomodi elastici per sistemare il visore in testa. Questa è la versione senza batteria che ho preso siccome lo uso fondamentalmente attaccato al pc con il cavo, se lo usate fondamentalmente come stand alone o con il virtual desktop, prendete il bundle con custodia e HeadStrap con batteria.Molto comodo, sta perfettamente in testa senza dare fastidio, personalmente lo trovo più confortevole dell'halo strap del Rift s (ma è una cosa soggettiva).Per l'installazione ci vogliono meno di 5 minuti, lo togli dalla scatola ed è pronto per essere installato.Imballaggio super e spedizione prima del previsto.5 stelle meritate.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on November 11, 2020

one_reviews_text: Se rompió después de 2 meses con ella, uso totalmente normal del visor sin caídas ni nada por el estilo lunes 24 de marzo del 2021, me espere a que las volvieran a continuar, la compré, es muy cómoda práctica y todo pero tiré 1300 pesos a la basura
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on May 24, 2021

one_reviews_text: Il primo accessorio che dovete assolutamente acquistare per Oculus Quest 2 e’ questo cinturino. Estremamente più comodo di quello in dotazione anche grazie alla calottina di gomma sulla nuca, facilissimo da montare, con un po di pazienza e calma. Facile da indossare, evita anche di toccare le lenti con la fronte e comodissima la rotellina posta sul retro per regolarlo a piacimento. Il tutto con una batteria supplementare che, oltre ad allungare le sessioni di gioco, permette di avere un buon bilanciamento dei pesi.Consigliatissimo!Aggiornamento:Dopo giorni di utilizzo tolgo una stella perché esiste un problema di hardware, per ora non risolto dall’assistenza ma noto, che fa scaricare la batteria del cinturino se questa rimane collegata con il cavetto al visore, anche se quest’ultimo è spento! Il consiglio è di scollegare la batteria quando non utiizzate il visore. Purtroppo è un problema che si verifica su tutte le unità quindi non risolvete sostituendola, basta dare uno sguardo al forum di Oculus. Speriamo che l’assistenza fornisca prima o poi una soluzione.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 5, 2022

one_reviews_text: Llevaba unos dias usando el Oculus Quest 2 con la correa que viene de serie y tenia la sensación de que ya funcionaba bastante bien y no había "mucho motivo" para cambiarla, lo hizo por recomendación de unos amigos.Una vez llegó ésta, la verdad es que el cambio es brutal, ahora sí que queda absolutamente fijo a la cabeza y es capaz de soportar el peso de un cable si juegas con las gafas conectadas. Un acierto de compra.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on January 20, 2021

one_reviews_text: La primera que la compre me decepciono bastante, ya que la parte de atrás para ajustar la correa no funcionaba bien, pedi un reemplazo y estas nuevas que me han llegado parece que también fallan a veces aunque menos que la otra, no es un fallo tan grave que impida usar el producto, pero sí que molesta, sin contar con este problema el producto cumple y funciona bien
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 18, 2022
review_title: Problemas con el ajuste de la correa

one_reviews_text: Es ist nicht nur die hervorragende Akku Laufzeit, die sich durch das Elite Strap verdoppelt, sondern der Halt und die Ausgewogenheit auf dem Kopf.Somit ist nicht soviel Last auf dem Vorderkopf und man kann es viel länger darunter aushalten..Nun habe ich das selbe Elite Akku Strap inkl. des original Oculus Harttop Case, bei Amazon IT zum selben Preis wie das Ohne Case in Deutschland.Nun wollte ich es an Amazon zurück geben, denn Kundenzufriedenheit ist ja Amazons grösstes GUT, aber die wollen mir mein Konto sperren wenn ich zu oft Artikel zurück sende, deshalb hab ich nun 2.Amazon DE sind die Kunden egal, auch verloren gegangende DHL Retouren werden ignoriert und das Geld einbehalten.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on March 6, 2022

one_reviews_text: The elite strap is definitely a whole lot better than the strap that comes out of the box with Oculus Quest 2 in that, at least, it makes Quest 2 usable without smashing your face up completely. But, it still doesn't quite do the job - for the steep price point, you would expect that it would but it doesn't. Suggest going for a halo strap instead.
review_date: Reviewed in India on December 11, 2021
review_title: An improvement on the original strap but still falls short

one_reviews_text: I rated this 3 stars only because this carry case feels light and flimsy and leaves me wondering how long the zipper will last positioned where it is, also if the small string attached to the zipper happens to break, then let’s say your up that creek without a virtual paddle,With that said, it does fit the Oculus Quest 2 and both controllers comfortably, although controller positioning is very important to ensure the lid will close properly.There is also not much room for both charger and link cable if you want to store everything in there.Feels like it was designed with functionality in mid but with no thought to material quality and extras that may be needed.To be honest, for the price, it’s ok, but there are better carry cases out there that look like they are built to last with extra storage pouches for not much more than this.The choice is yours
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 29, 2020
review_title: You get what you pay for

one_reviews_text: 本体と一緒に購入RTX2080Ti の背面端子に直接接続、設定は特に何もしなくて良くsteamのVRゲームがあっさり動き感動充電しながら遊べるためVRゲームを本格的に遊ぶなら必須なケーブル作りも良く、値段以上の満足感
review_date: Reviewed in Japan on October 17, 2020
review_title: これが無かったらOculus2 の魅力半減

one_reviews_text: Not worth the $79 to be honest. It broke within a month of having it... while it was in my case.... it snapped...... It’s harder than the other strap to put in with glasses and it sits low on my head and to keep it from slipping I have to tighten it so tight and then my forehead gets sore very fast.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 22, 2021

one_reviews_text: La verdad es que es un estuche para las oculus quest 2 realmente bonito.Sorprende lo compacto que es, no parece que vayan a caber las gafas y los mandos, pero encaja todo perfectamente y queda muy bien protegido, está muy bien diseñado.La tapa se cierra con una pequeña cremallera.El material es una especie de fieltro fino bastante agradable al tacto.Hayuchas otras fundas más baratas, pero si te lo puedes permitir, recomiendo esta oficial, está muy bien.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 20, 2020

one_reviews_text: Confermo che con il cinturino Elite l'esperienza VR è decisamente migliorata, durante sessioni prolungate in movimento non si deve continuamente sistemare il visore per avere una visione ottimale, il bilanciamento non è male sembra quasi diminuire il peso totale.L'appoggio posteriore in gomma è comodo e si adatta perfettamente alla testa, il fissaggio tramite rotella è ben saldo e non scricchiola niente.Voto 7.5/10Pro:ComodoDi facile regolazioneContro:Prezzo
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 8, 2021

one_reviews_text: Das Ding ist ein Wahnsinn.Es ist einfach anzulegen und abzunehmen. Der Drehknopf zum fester ziehen ist genial.Es hält den Oculus Quest 2 fest am Kopf und balanciert es genual aus.Ja, man muss es zusammen mit dem Oculus laden, aber wie sollte man es sonst tun?Wenn der Saft aus ist (was nicht so schnell passiert), schliesst man halt sein Oculus am Strom an. Ich habe es bis jetzt auch nicht anders gemacht. Verstehe die Kritik von anderen nicht.Auch wenn es ein bisschen teuer ist, es ist jeden Penny wert.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on January 21, 2022

one_reviews_text: Artículo que parece con materiales de bastante calidad, elegante y ocupa poco espacio, pero no es nada versátil.Apto principalmente para transportar las gafas y los mandos con algo de protección si vas en el coche o recogerlas para guardarlas cuando no se usan si es no tienes un soporte para ese fin.Para llevarlo andando o en bicicleta no es cómodo. No dispone de una cinta para llevarlo estilo bolsa o tirantes para echarlo a la espalda estilo mochila, solo una cinta para sujetarlo en la muñeca y eso es poco práctico para trasladarlo.Por otro lado, está preparado para la correa original que viene con las gafas (desconozco si alguna más) pero yo tengo 2 correas más rígidas (una de ellas de batería) y ninguna sirve para este estuche, lo que lo hace un estuche demasiado limitado.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on May 9, 2022
review_title: Está bien, pero limitado en espacio y no permite cualquier correa de las gafas

one_reviews_text: Muy decepcionado del producto. Comprado el 8 de mazo. Roto hoy 3 días después de la ventana de devolución. Increíble que vendan un producto así de malo como “elite”. Buscaré más opciones. Porque en México al parecer no hay forma de hacer válida la garantía por parte de Facebook o en Amazon.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on April 11, 2021
review_title: Mal producto. Se rompió al mes.

one_reviews_text: La custodia è carina da vedere all'esterno, ma i pregi finiscono qua.Il materiale è sufficientemente robusto ma troppo sottile, una caduta potrebbe danneggiare qualcosa.La zip è incredibilmente scadente, sembra debba rompersi da un momento all'altro. Inoltre la zip è INTERNA, si apre e chiude tramite un laccetto esterno, il che rende inutilmente difficile la sostituzione in caso di rottura.L'alloggiamento per i controller non include alcun supporto per tenerli fermi. Semplicemente si poggiano in mezzo alla custodia liberi di muoversi.In generale penso non sia una buona custodia.Un prezzo ragionevole potrebbe essere 20€, ma solo per il logo Oculus questa custodia costa 50€.Prezzo veramente ridicolo.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 16, 2021

one_reviews_text: La qualità del cavo c’è, ma ho dato una stella in primis per il prezzo che assolutamente non vale l’acquisto, e come secondo punto si presenta un problema grave, che molti hanno riscontrato, il fatto di collegare un usb c ad un pc con un cavo simile comporta il piegarsi e deteriorarsi dell’unica porta del pc, consiglio di utilizzare un adattatore usb c/ usb se già avete questo cavo, se non l’avete lo sconsiglio.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on February 7, 2021
review_title: Prezzo esagerato e problemi con la porta usb c

one_reviews_text: El primer propósito de la compra fue tener mas tiempo para poder utilizar el visor lo cual se cumple muy bien. A pesar de que muchos reviews lo califican como más cómodo, yo siento el strap un poco mas rígido y pesado lo cuál me cansa un poco más, hay que acomodarlo muy bien para que quede cómodo, igualmente según he visto en varios reviews los brazos laterales por ser tan rígidos tienden a quebrarse si no se manejan con cuidado, lo que me lleva a manejarlo siempre cuidadosamente por miedo a que se rompan. Otro aspecto negativo es que aunque el strap tiene su propio conector para cargar, si conectas el link cable para la computadora este no transmite datos es decir no funciona, lo cual me parece mal por que tienes que conectarlo al puerto original evitando que puedas usar la batería con el link cable, solo podrás usarlo en modo air link lo que si no tienes un bien wifi causa respuesta lenta en algunos juegos, ojalá en una versión futura esto pueda ser arreglado, por lo demás lo considero buen producto
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on January 25, 2022
review_title: Práctico para aumentar el tiempo de vida pero no util con el link cable

one_reviews_text: è un prodotto ottimo la comodita' del quest e la praticita' aumentano del 200%non ho riscontrato la debolezza delle plastiche tanto criticataLa rondella di regolazione ' molto solida4 stelle perche' non vale 50 euro ma seriamenteil prezzo giusto sarebbe scarsi 30 euro
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 7, 2021

one_reviews_text: Comodo, raddoppia la durata del visore, utilissimo in uso airlink, personalmente lo trovo molto più comodo della fascia economica in dotazione del quest 2, nonostante il visore rimane “schiacciato sul volto” la comodità d’uso diventa paragonabile al rift (Che ha un sistema di ancoraggio che appoggia il visore sulla fronte)Unica nota dolente; mia figlia di 17 anni di struttura esile non riesce ad indossarlo a causa della robustezza della sagomatura che preme in modo fastidioso sulla sua retro della testa (problema con non li leva con la fascia in dotazione e ne con il rift), io (di struttura media) non riscontro analoga criticità.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on February 18, 2022

one_reviews_text: Potessi tornare indietro, comprerei quello della KIWI.Il prezzo è esagerato e non offre nulla, un pochetto di comodità rispetto allo schifo in dotazione ma nulla di più.Per toglierlo, bisogna usare due mani. Userò sempre due mani, ed il giorno che si romperà aggiornerò la recensione, scrivo questo perché la qualità dei materiali è veramente bassa.L'installazione è semplice ed intuitiva.Non offre nessuna gestione del cavo oculus link, almeno potevano prevederlo.Potessi tornare indietro, non riacquisterei e prenderei il KIWI che offre comodità, stabilità nel toglierlo ad una mano e solidità dei materiali.. ad un prezzo inferiore.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on November 3, 2021

one_reviews_text: Fits well and is a significant improvement to the terrible default band.But despite its immense size (it feels like you're strapping mephisto to the back of your head as you work the retraction mechanism), the band is as flimsy as 1ply toilet paper and lasts just as long.  I got 6 uses out of it over 3 months before it gave out and snapped at the arm.I'd have been better off building a strap out of the cash I wasted on this worthless piece of crap
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on July 29, 2021

one_reviews_text: En este caso, pagamos por la marca, y llevar el logo, el producto, por sus acabados y calidad de los componentes no debería costar más de 10€, aparte de eso que se ve según te llega, y te quedas a cuadros con la poca calidad que desprende el producto, tener el logo no lo compensa, la cremallera le duró un par de usos hasta que empezó a trabarse y no cerrar de forma suave, es la única parte que tiene un uso más directo y no se han esforzado lo más mínimo en poner algo de calidad, he visto cremalleras en bolsas de los todo a cien que le dan mil vueltas, tanto en calidad y funcionamiento.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 20, 2022

one_reviews_text: Bought this on sale so the pricing was a bit less outrageous. However just keep in mine that buying this official link cable will probably saves you a headache (and some neckpain) since you get the best bandwidth for the task plus the fibre cable is very light and flexible like people said.The MAIN issue is that, this IS NOT the best way to experience PCVR on your quest headset, not by a long shot. I find my performance lackluster while using this cable.I would suggest someone who is aiming to play pcvr to try the MUCH superior method of wireless streaming via virtual reality, it's 80% cheaper, performs better, wireless, and its just mind blowing tbh. Try that if your network can handling it first before buying this cable.I move around alot and live in sharehouses so having this cable as a backup makes sense.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 19, 2021
review_title: Best cable choice but Not the best PCVR experience

one_reviews_text: Compré un cable de cobre de alrededor 500 mxn antes de este, no pasó ni el mes y ya se había estropeado el interior del cable, tenía que dejarlo en una posición determinada para que este marcara cómo USB 3 en el software de oculus; a pesar de que el cable fuera super grueso y pareciera de uso rudo, no duró nada. Lo bueno que aproveché la ventana de 30 días de amazon para la devolución del cable defectuoso.Y para no volver a gastar otra vez 500 en algo que probablemente iba a desempeñar igual que el cable anterior, opté por este, hasta la fecha todo bien, no han pasado 3 semanas cómo el otro, pero puedo decir que este durará si no me tropiezo con el, es bastante más flexible y te deja moverte más libremente, lo único que podría cambiarle es que la entrada usb c al oculus es un poco floja, cosa que no pasaba en los cables chinos, pero bueno; mientras no la toques deliberadamente, no pasa nada.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on October 25, 2021

one_reviews_text: Auf der einen Seite genieße ich die längere kabellose Sessiondauer in VR, aber auf der anderen Seite ist die hintere Kopfstütze nicht gepolstert.Wenn man die VR Brille etwas fester haben möchte, um Wackeln beim hin und her drehen zu vermeiden ist man nach einer Weile mit Schmerzen konfrontiert.*Vermutlich spielt auch die Kopfform eine Rolle, aber eine Polsterung würde dies leicht ändern.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on February 7, 2022
review_title: Längerer Spielspaß aber nicht perfekt Komfortabel

one_reviews_text: Ya había leído que se rompen al poco tiempo en artículos de Internet, pero pensaba que era debido al mal uso. La he tratado con excesivo cuidado y aún así no ha durado ni un año a pesar de que uso las Oculus bastante poco.Además el soporte de Oculus me ha hecho quedarme sin correa más tiempo del debido, ya que hasta que no han recibido la correa rota, que no sé para qué querrán, no me han mandado el reemplazo.No volveré a comprar accesorios originales de Oculus.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on April 21, 2022
review_title: Pésima calidad. Se rompe al poco tiempo de uso.

one_reviews_text: Es cómodo, pero a día de hoy, tiene una calidad nefasta para el precio que tiene (50€). De hecho facebook llegó a descatalogarlo durante un tiempo debido a la gran cantidad de devoluciones por roturas.Realmente, no recomendaría su compra. Aquí en Amazon hay otros productos extraoficiales mas baratos y de mejor calidad y comodidad.Los agarres de tipo frontal como este, acaban provocando fatiga facial en los pómulos tras 30-60min de uso. En cambio los agarres de tipo diadema (también los venden aquí en Amazon), cómo los que tenía oculus Rift S o PSVR son mucho mas estables a la hora de que el visor no se mueva. Y no dan presión ni molestan en la cara.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 5, 2021
review_title: Muy cómodo, pero excesivamente caro para la calidad que tiene

one_reviews_text: I bought this on 10th December, 2020 so I have had this for awhile, I'm now getting some cracks on the strap, sticky tape solved it and after googling around it's apparently been fixed in newer versions by Oculus. I don't know if this is resolved in newer versions but it did last a solid year and a bit, it made it through quite a number of hours of usage (finished half life alyx, star wars games, uncle going super man dive into a chair from richies plank etc.) so it's had a good life.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on August 12, 2021

one_reviews_text: En el estuche los mandos se rozan y necesitas darles varias vueltas para colócalos (No se hace rápido) .El accesorio de las gafas no cabe e instrucciones no caben.El enchufe entra justo.La ebilla (Que es una cuerda frágil) que cierra el estuche, se rompe con sólo mirarla.Más valdría haber hecho un estuche más grande con huecos específicos de los mandos y más compartimentos.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on March 19, 2021

one_reviews_text: Lo pillé porque un amigo me comentó que si vas a pasar mas de 1h con las oculus, merecen la pena,ya que el agarre es mucho mas optimo. Dicho y hecho, lleva otro plastico para hacer que las gafas estén mas ajustadas, las correas son de calidad, y el montaje se hace en 5 min.La satisfaccion es total, y puedes pasar un par de horas sin dolor de frente, orejas, o cabeza.Las recomiendo si se van a pasar mas de 1h con ellas puestas.No pillé las chinas, porque me comentaron que las correas hacían daño en la sujeción, pero todo es cuestión de gustos.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on May 17, 2021

one_reviews_text: Los brazos se sienten un poco endebles por lo que se debe ser muy cuidadoso para que no se rompan. Sé que ha habido muchos reportes de usuarios a quien se le ha roto al poco uso, por lo que hay que tomarlo en cuenta antes de comprar.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on December 29, 2020
review_title: Brazos frágiles x lo que puede romperse

one_reviews_text: Sicuramente è più comoda della soluzione stock, ma non di così tanto da giustificare 50€. Scricchiola spesso e volentieri e non da per nulla la sensazione di solidità.Fatta rimborsare, e nel frattempo tengo d'occhio soluzioni third-party migliori. Insomma se proprio la volete prendetela, ma come valore io non andrei oltre i 20€.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on December 19, 2020

one_reviews_text: Ho comprato questo headset a Ottobre 2020, ho utilizzato il visore per un buon monte di ore, ma non in modo eccessivo (4/5 ore a settimana se non meno) e trattando tutto con estremo rispetto (visto anche il costo del dispositivo).Siamo a fine Luglio 2021 e noto una cricca su uno dei 2 braccetti semirigidi, di quelle cricche che solo la plastica esausta può dare.Eseguito immediatamente il reso con sostituzione di Amazon, e in meno di 24h il corriere è arrivato alla mia porta.Vedremo se questo secondo cinturino resisterà per più tempo, magari è stata una delle prime batch fallate, per ora il voto è 2 essendo che altri visori durano anni prima di presentare i medesimi problemi.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on July 28, 2021
review_title: Comodo, veloce da regolare, ma fragile

one_reviews_text: Pro :- Light & length is long enough to power the Quest 2 for far more than 2 hours of gaming/movies watching (most important)- Charging is possible quite fast if you connect it to any USB-C 3.x port.- Great performance on PCVR gaming using Oculus Link.Con :- A bit high on price.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 7, 2020
review_title: A good & must product for the Oculus Quest player

one_reviews_text: Cheaply made, poor quality control. Much larger gap exposing zip on one side. Doesn't appear to be a defect, just high tolerances. Materials feel cheap also.Despite being specifically designed for the quest 2 it doesn't hold it very securely, if you shake it everything will shuffle around.Luckily go it on sale, and it does the job. I'm mostly using it for home storage. It's overpriced for what it is and likely not suitable for someone traveling with their device.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 21, 2020

one_reviews_text: Il cinturino è comodo e funzionale tuttavia dopo circa un anno di utilizzo randomico e senza mai particolari stress ha iniziato a creparsi sulle stecche.Credo che sia stato studiato e creato con problematiche strutturali. Non regge il peso del visore sul lungo periodo.Amazon ha provveduto a sostituire il prodotto in maniera come sempre impeccabile.Spero che nel frattempo abbiano apportato modifiche al prodotto.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on October 3, 2021

one_reviews_text: "Is it worth the premium" is probably what you're looking to answer. After sitting on the fence for a while and using a shorter third-party cable I took the plunge. I think it was worth it. The cable is very good quality, quite light and flexible which helps reduce the drag of being tethered to a PC. Works great as you'd expect but I guess it's a quality of life purchase rather than a necessity when there are other much cheaper cables on the market that will do the job. Still, highly recommended.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 12, 2021
review_title: A quality cable - flexible, long and tough

one_reviews_text: Es una basura de producto, el material es pesimo, a la minima que lo dobles mal se te rompe, a mi el 2o par que me cambiaron se me rompio solo con alfojarlo para ponermelo en la cabeza, cosa que se supone que deberia de aguantar ya que es algo que vas a usar todos los dias para ponerte y quitarte digo yo, pero no segun facebook no hace falta tener un producto que dure tanto. Quitando a parte la pesima calidad del producto voy a lo siguiente, la garantia, Si, facebook te da una garantia en la cual si se te rompe por cualquier motivo(porque saben que la calidad es muy mala pero aun asi lo venden) te lo reemplazan. Bueno pues llevo 2 meses discutiendo con facebook para que me reemplacen la correa rota, 2 meses. Mi opinion es que os dejeis de tonterias y no compreis esta porqueria, os sale mucho mas rentable comprar otra correa por menos precio que tiene 1000 veces mejor calidad que esto, mejor gastarse 20€ y que te dure 3 meses, que gastarte 50€ que te dure 1 mes y que cuando se te rompa facebook no te haga ni puñetero caso a la hora de reemplazar el producto al que ellos mismo te dan la garantia.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on December 1, 2021
review_title: No pongo menos estrellas porque no me deja

one_reviews_text: I really wanted an upgrade for the default elastic band on Oculus Quest 2. So bought this without it giving much of a thought. But I soon realised that this product has a design flaw because of which majority of the straps just break. It didn’t take long for my strap to face the same issue.My recommendation would be to go buy any other cheap alternatives of this one. Apart from the design issue this is quite expensive for a piece of plastic.P.S. This does not have any battery pack at the back, this is just the strap.
review_date: Reviewed in India on April 2, 2022

one_reviews_text: Si tienes las Quest 2 como es mi caso no puede faltar para jugar desde pc y mejorar el rendimiento y graficos notablemente, muy contento con la compra pese a su precio
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on December 29, 2020

one_reviews_text: There are a lot of long USB cables out there, good and cheap, but the fibre optic construction of this cable is fairly unique and usually reserved for professional-grade equipment costing several times more.In the case of this cable, that construction makes the cable much more supple and lightweight, yet capable of great speeds and can positively charge a quest 2 during play. When you buy a cheaper cable you're going to be making a compromise in one or more of those areas.If you only sit to play racing or space sims you might get away with a cheaper 3m cable, or a heavier active cable, but for anything more active or where you're standing that weight of the cable is going to become more of an issue.But the other option to look at is a wireless connection via Virtual Desktop. Because i play a lot of FPS games and don't use stick turning, even the mighty official link cable becomes twisted and loses its length. So now i use the link almost exclusively for seated experiences, and VD for everything else. The best USB cable still has limitations.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on March 23, 2021
review_title: In this instance you get what you pay for!

one_reviews_text: Hatte das 3rd Party Ding von KIWI ausprobiert, aber das hier hält auf meinem Kopf viel besser.Schade, dass das Klett Band kein Polster hat, das wäre schon.Der Akku bringt Gleichgewicht ins Spiel und macht das Tragen angenehmer.Das Headset kann sogar den Akkustand anzeigen, leider nicht im Menü, sondern nur wenn es aus ist.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on January 16, 2022
review_title: Jetzt fühlt sich das VR Headset komplett an

one_reviews_text: Despite any other reviews here I found this absolutely perfect. I've got the quest 2 + elite strap with battery pack and it all fits perfectly in the case without any issues. The case itself had a hard plastic exterior even though it looks like soft felt in the photos.. and yes the zipper looks quite thin but as long as you don't try to break any speed records when using the zipper it'll be fine.  My expensive toy feels protected and I'm happy with the purchase.  I bought it on sale too after Xmas so the discount made it worthwhile.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 25, 2022

one_reviews_text: Per me è stato un ottimo acquisto, ho risolto il problema di dover regolare le cinghie ogni volta che in famiglia ci passiamo il dispositivo l'un l'altro in quanto girando semplicemente la rotella si adatta a tutte le misure.Per quanto riguarda le rotture che vengono segnalate in giro da chi lo possiede posso dire che lo uso ormai da qualche mese e non ho nessuna evidenza in merito anche se com'è giusto lo tratto sempre con la dovuta delicatezza.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on April 3, 2021

one_reviews_text: Il prezzo e veramente ingiustificato, e un pezzettino di plasticaccia che avrebbe un valore che a esagerare dovrebbe costare 30€, in più nel mio caso in particolare appunto per risparmiare ho acquistato questo articolo da un venditore Amazon che lo proponeva "usato, come nuovo" ed e arrivato spaccato... 1 stella per il prodotto e  10 stelle ad Amazon come sempre che risolve questi misfatti in men che non si dica
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on June 23, 2021

one_reviews_text: Ho letto tanti commenti positivi e negativi su questo cavo. Prima di acquistarlo, ho optato per l'Amavision ma con l'utilizzo costante, cominciava a disconnettersi un pò troppo di frequente per i miei gusti. Alla fine ho deciso di investire su quello originale e devo dire che non ho avuto nessun problema di disconnessione e/o incertezza. Ovviamente questa è la mia esperienza personale. Per quanto riguarda la velocità di trasmissione più o meno si equivalgono....nel mio caso un pelo più veloce l'originale (2.2 contro 2.0)
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on March 21, 2021

one_reviews_text: No hay duda de que este producto es muy superior a la headband incluida con Quest 2.Sin embargo, la relación calidad-precio es terrible, el material ni siquiera se acerca a los 50 €.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on October 23, 2020

one_reviews_text: La trovo fatta bene, a prima vista ha una forma molto semplice ed il materiale è morbido esternamente, la cerniera è nascosta e scorre grazie ad un laccetto, ho letto che molti si preoccupano della eventuale fragilità, ma non ho letto di cerniere rotte fino ad oggi, non credo sia fragile come sembra. Lo spazio interno è progettato bene, ci sta tutto il necessario, compreso cavo e caricabatterie. Per me acquisto ok!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on April 18, 2021

one_reviews_text: Hi there, if you have an Oculus Quest 2 it's because you wanted to have a VR headset which is independent of a PC and because it is an awesome value for money.... well PLEASE do your self a favor and invest into the Portable case.. it is an absolute MUST!It fits the VR headset, controllers, I also obtained the Elite head strap and it fits perfect too... it has room for your charger and I recommend a microfiber cloth as well to clean the lenses from time to time...The Quality of the case is amazing and very sturdy to protect your investment, it has a great zip which is easy to open and  worth every cent !Happy to answer questions if you have any...
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 12, 2021
review_title: Got Oculus ? YOU MUST BUY THE CASE!

one_reviews_text: All good , fits nice and snug, well protected too... until you install the upgraded back of the head thingy for a more secured fit.... the lid won’t close now and can’t get the zip around... useless.., now I have to send it back ... maybe I missed a review...
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 16, 2021
review_title: Don’t buy this if you’re gonna upgrade the head strap

one_reviews_text: Ante todo, lo primero sorprende el tamaño. Es enorme, es como unas fundas de gafas "normales" gigante.Dicho ésto, la funda es muy bonita y la calidad de materiales es importante.Cómo era de esperar al ser la funda oficial, todo encaja perfectamente, y hay espacio de sobra para el visor, los controllers, el cargador y la separación para las gafas, todo ello sin tener que presionar y sin ir justo.Lo dicho, es cara, pero en mi opinión lo vale.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on October 23, 2020

one_reviews_text: The USB-C connector at the end isn't properly engineered for this so it bends really easily just by sitting in the headset. It can't support its own weight. The strap tries to mitigate this, but fails to do so clearly because my end is starting to bend so badly its splitting the casing in two. The USB-C cable is the perfect length. I would just suggest using AirLink unless you need less latency and the superior image quality for say Beat Saber. No need to buy this if you're thinking of using it for... adult reasons... 3 stars for good functionality, poor build quality.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on July 25, 2021
review_title: Poor build quality, does its job

one_reviews_text: el acabado es muy bueno pese a que la tapa no cierra del todo bien y el tirador de la cremallera es un hilillo muy endeble, esta diseñado expresamente para llevar el Elite strap, si no lo tienes deja espacio para el visor dos mandos el cargador con su cable y si eres mañoso puedes meter el cable oculus link auriculares y un powerbank.Hay que reconocer que la funda del Quest 1 estaba machismo mejor diseñado y acabado.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on January 18, 2021
review_title: el visor baila un poco dentro

one_reviews_text: yo lo compre pensando que el problema de que se quebraban estaba resuelto, pero el dia de hoy a estar actualizando mi lentes a la version 31 y limpiarlos me di cuenta que mi strap esta agrietado y apunto de quebrarse, contacte a amazon y me dicen que con ellos son solo 30 dias de garantia y que debo de contactar a OCULUS, los contacto y me dicen que no hacen validas garantias para mexico  que contacte a la compañia donde los compre, asi que ya no tuve ninguna otra opcion, sinceramente AMAZON deberian de tener un acuerdo con OCULUS para ver lo de las garantias porque no es justo que pase esto, agradezco que no me han fallado los lentes si no tendria un pisapapeles de $10,000 pesos por no tener en donde hacer valida la garantia
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on August 18, 2021

one_reviews_text: Si cambias de correa, no te vale para nada.Si no vas a usar otras correas o meter nada más que gafas y mandos sin fundas, perfecto.Buen material y encaja perfectamente
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on March 30, 2022
review_title: Solo para la correa del modelo

one_reviews_text: El precio valdría la pena si no se hubiera roto d ambos lados a los 7 meses, lo tuve con cinta otros 2 meses pero solo es cuestión de tiempo que termine rompiéndose.Es muy cómodo a comparación del bobovr m2 (sin batería) aunque el bobo el halo hace que la cara no te duela, pero no se siente tan firme.A comparación del kiwi design elite strap, creo es mas cómodo el elite strap pero conforme use el kiwi, parece mas que aún sigo ajustando y encontrando mejores formas de ponerlo
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on February 2, 2022
review_title: Comparada con otras 3 straps, sería la mejor si no se rompiera

one_reviews_text: Indispensable ! Le confort est bien supérieur au maintien d'origine... Le casque paraît plus léger et ne glisse pas du tout
review_date: Reviewed in France on October 16, 2020

one_reviews_text: Costa tanto ma io, dovendo scegliere, ho preferito prendere il cavo originale piuttosto che quelli più economici ma non originali.E al momento sto trovando molto bene...Il cavo è robusto ma risulta anche flessibile il giusto.5 metri sono ottimi anche per i giochi che necessitano di molto movimento!Inoltre non sto avendo alcun problema con lo spinotto usb type c, a differenza di altri utenti... che scrivono che il cavo si stacca facilmente e non è ben saldo alla presa.Con il mio pc al contrario è tutto saldo e ben funzionante!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on November 29, 2020

one_reviews_text: L'idea del prodotto non è male, anzi, il supporto che fornisce questo Elite nella distribuzione del peso dell'oculus è OTTIMO: peccato si rompa.Inizialmente pensavo di essere tra i fortunati a cui non si sarebbe potuto rompere, essendo durato ben 3 mesi senza crepe, un giorno però mi sono reso conto di una piccola crepa sulla banda laterale che si è allargata sempre di più con pochissimi utilizzi.Evitate di acquistarlo poiché anche utilizzandolo con i guanti il prodotto si romperà.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on October 13, 2021

one_reviews_text: The strap works pretty well 99% of the time, however there is a design flaw with the strap. Any bending or especially twisting to the plastic just behind the connector to the headset will snap it with absolutely no force. You need to be careful even when just putting it down. I had to send one back to Amazon because it couldn't even survive shipping the first time... The plastic should be thicker, especially given the very high price tag for an average piece of plastic.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on July 25, 2021
review_title: Much more comfortable, breaks very easily

one_reviews_text: I was initially sceptical about this add on feature for my Oculus Quest 2, but now that I have had time to use it, I cannot recommend it more highly.  The change in both comfort and ease of use is immediately noticeable.  I very much recommend this strap as your first purchase (other than games) for your Quest 2.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on November 30, 2020
review_title: Essential upgrade for your Oculus Quest 2

one_reviews_text: I got headaches from the standard strap supplied by Oculus, I was a bit sceptical spending more money on a device that was causing me a headache already, but after reading the reviews, I took the chance... I dont regret it!!! I am a believer in this product! Great quality! Easy to install, amazing to have such comfort and an additional 2 hours playtime :) I now don't want to take the VR off
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 9, 2022
review_title: This is a game changer! A must have!!

one_reviews_text: Cuando compre este producto la primera vez se me partió una de las bandas laterales por la mitad, hice una devolución y sin problemas, me devolvieron el dinero.Pensando que ya habían mejorado la calidad del producto (ya que lo dejaron de vender, lo investigaron y volvieron a poner en venta el producto pero con "mejoras") lo volví a comprar. Hace unos días me fijé que en los que se engancha con las gafas ha salido una raja, de momento no parece ir a más pero no me fío de seguir usando las gafas con una strap en ese estado.Estoy totalmente decepcionado, porque m va q tocar volver a devolver el producto.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on August 28, 2021

one_reviews_text: The head strap sits comfortably when playing standing. The adjustments are easy and also easy to install. The extra battery adds an extra hour or so of game play. I’d say it’s only average.As for what I didn’t like, it’s really not well thought through. If you have to check something like quickly looking at your phone or check the surroundings for obstacles, you need to unhook and readjust the whole thing again. Also, if you have some games such as guided meditation, which requires you to lay down, with this head strap is impractical as it adda quite a lot at the back of your head and basically you can’t lay down comfortably.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 5, 2022

one_reviews_text: It broke in 2 months. Material is extremely poor quality. Not sure if this is authentic even.
review_date: Reviewed in India on January 4, 2022

one_reviews_text: Used a few different 3rd party cables which only lasted a few months and had intermittent connection issues.  This cable is massively better and I have had no connection issues and I eventually accepted the high price.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on February 27, 2021

one_reviews_text: Purtroppo è un accessorio assai costoso per essere solo un pezzo di plastica, ma molto essenziale se si possiede un Oculus Quest 2, la differenza tra i laccetti in dotazione e il supporto rigido si nota molto, oltre che essere più stabile è anche molto più comodo e veloce mettersi e togliersi il visore.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 14, 2022

one_reviews_text: Este strap es muy comodo pero no duro ni dos semanas, al poco tiempo de uso normal se rompio.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on March 8, 2021

one_reviews_text: Come da titolo, ragazzi attenzione, perché non va bene per tutte le teste purtroppo!!Io ho una nuca piuttosto piatta, con collo grosso, e capelli quasi a zero (indi la cute non funge da ulteriore spessore).Risultato, mi rimane una parte vuota dell'archetto posteriore e tocca solo la parte curva della nuca.Questo mi procura una sensazione che sinceramente mi fa preferire lo strap standard.Gli do qualche giorno di prova ancora... altrimenti mi sa che lo restituiró.Nel mio caso, trovo assolutamente migliori, i visori con sistema di blocco ad aureola, tipo RIFT S o PSVR !!!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 6, 2021
review_title: Attenzione perché non va bene per tutti...

one_reviews_text: Es un producto imprescindible para disfrutar de las Oculus comodamente, por lo que no se entiende que no vengan incluídas en el producto y se vendan como accesorio.El producto está bien y es cómodo pero en mi caso, con muy poco uso y sin utilización incorrecta, una de las patillas laterales se ha resquebrajado en la parte trasera simplemente por coger las gafas por uno de los laterales.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 9, 2022
review_title: Es mucho más comodo que el original, pero la calidad no es la mejor. Se ha roto con muy poco uso.

one_reviews_text: Battery on strap did not charge and it did not charge the main unit as well. Sent back for inmediate replacement. Received replacement a week later and another problem occured. The glue and screw on right side of the rubber headrest came off the hinge, it is impossible to fix this at home due to the position of the screw, everything is already snapped in place and unsnapping it may break the unit more. Very dissapointed with a genuine product from Facebook. Their quality assurance department seem to be sleeping at the wheel. How can such a simple item have so many faults, it's not rocket science. It's just a headstrap with a battery attached to it and sold for an absurd price.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 26, 2021
review_title: Battery does not charge! And now another problem!

one_reviews_text: An excellent replacement for the default strap. Keeps the headset firmly against your face with little to no movement. I found it made it far easier to get the correct eye relief from the lenses. The pressure exerted on you face feels difference but you get used to it quickly.The elite strap does not seem to impact on what head phones you are able to wear as it work well with both my G432 and Hyper X Cloud.Easy to fit, the design and materials seem study so I don't see this breaking through normal use.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on November 30, 2020

one_reviews_text: Si tienes la cabeza un poco grande, te molestará bastante (yo tengo una almendra bien curiosa y se me hace molesto y hasta doloroso tras poco más de 5 minutos con el puesto. Personalmente se la he regalado a un amigo y me he comprado el Halo del proveedor asiático, ese que parece de las PSVR.PS: Oculus, amigos, Mark, pensad en las pobres gentes con una cabeza de tamaño considerable. A ver no soy Fernando Alonso, pero es superior a la media y es molesto.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 27, 2021
review_title: Quizás para gente normal, pero no para almendracos

one_reviews_text: Aún no lo he probado con las oculus por qué está por llegar pero el producto se ve bien, aunque como pega las marcas como arañado de la goma que recubre la cabeza pero por lo demás se ve bien
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on December 15, 2021
review_title: No está como nuevo pero está bien

one_reviews_text: fatto con materiali riciclati, il prezzo è assurdo per la qualità contando che è compensato di cartone praticamente, però è molto stilosa e capiente come custodia, riesco anche a mettere dentro il quest con l'halo band, a fatica, ma ci sta!
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on March 18, 2022

one_reviews_text: A primera vista se nota que el zipper sera lo primero en romperse, el material es como carton afelpado (la verdad ni siquiera se como describirlo) se siente debil y no da la impresion de que proteja bien el quest 2 en caso de caida. Si pueden compren otro, hay mejores estuches por el mismo precio.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on February 20, 2021
review_title: Esta muy caro para lo que es.

one_reviews_text: Se hace imprescindible una vez que la pruebas, las cintas elásticas no están mal pero esto es otro nivel. Proporciona mucha más comodidad y se ajusta en un plis. Si te has gastado una pasta en el visor por un poco más merece mucho la pena.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on October 24, 2020

one_reviews_text: This should come standard with the Quest 2, is a lot of maybes about it breaking but Oculus have said they are offering complete replacements if it does break plus Aussie warranty covers it so giving it a go, this really should come with the quest though it's so much better.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on March 5, 2021

one_reviews_text: ベルトの装着感が悪かったので、こちらの商品を注文しました。しかしエリートストラップを使っても装着感に納得がいかずバッテリーパックを真似てモバイルバッテリー等をポーチにまとめたおもりを用意した所装着感がかなり改善されました。そこで、装着感が悪かったのはバランスのせいではないかと思い試しにとベルトに戻しおもりを取り付けた所、あれだけ苦しかったベルトが絶妙なフィット感に。結果ベルトの方が快適になってしまったのでこちらの商品は不要になりました。純正品である事を加味しても値段が高いのでこの商品を買う前に、適切な重さのおもりを探してみる事をお勧めします。
review_date: Reviewed in Japan on October 22, 2020
review_title: いまいちなのでベルトに戻しました

one_reviews_text: Estuve viendo varios cases e incluso compré otro que venía con algunos accesorios, sin embargo lo tuve que devolver ya que el oculus no cabía con todo y la elite strap lo cual fue una decepción. Por lo que terminé comprando este modelo y definitivamente es el mejor en cuanto a diseño, funcionalidad y calidad.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on August 30, 2021

one_reviews_text: Gare a vous si vous prenez ce cable, car ce qu'Oculus ne dit pas c'est qu'il y a de gros problèmes de compatibilité !Du coup sur certaines config l'utilisateur se retrouve en USB 2.0 au lieu d'USB 3.0, et perd tous les avantages du cable "high-tec". Casquer 100 euros pour ca, c'est juste de l'arnaque.De plus vous pourrez comptez sur le support pour vous ballader en accusant le pc, les mises a jour, windows, l'alignement des planetes et vous faire perdre des heures des heures en réinstallation alors qu'en fait le bug est juste chez eux. J'ose pas imaginer ce qu'ils auraient osé me sortir sorti si j'avais pas eu le cable officiel.Bref...Virtual Desktop c'est bien, et tant qu'a subir le bug vaut mieux le subir avec un cable a 20 euros que celui-la, car non l'officiel ne garanti rien du tout.
review_date: Reviewed in France on March 20, 2021

one_reviews_text: Fantastic upgrade to the Quest 2 headset! First thing you will notice is how much better the weight distribution is. No more front heavy issues, yes it still feels like you have something on your head but so much more comfortable than with the original strap and more comfortable than the Quest 1. I had a friend that likes to come over and play VR on my Quest 2, he found the elastic strap uncomfortable on his head and so I purchased the Elite Strap to make it more enjoyable for friends and family to play, he immediately found it a far more enjoyable experience, you can play for hours without any issues. No more sore neck from the uneven weight. And as a bonus it makes the headset look amazing! If you have the extra money and want to improve the Quest 2 then definetly grab the Elite Strap! This is a must buy and you won't regret the purchase!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 19, 2020

one_reviews_text: No pienso que sea un mal producto ni mucho menos,pero en mi caso no termino de estar agusto ya que todo el peso de las gafas queda en la cara,prefiero mucho mejor un halo que apoye en la frente como el halostrap o bobovr.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on February 2, 2022

one_reviews_text: This strap should have been standard as it makes using the headset extremely more comfortable and makes longer plays sessions a breeze. Fits little heads to around 4 years old so a good size range.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on November 23, 2020
review_title: A must have for Quest 2 owners

one_reviews_text: I am not a frequent user of my Quest 2, I mainly use it when the interest arises. I have looked after my headset and there is not a single bit of cosmetic damage, outside of some mild discolouration caused by sweat. When I tried to use it today, the side plastic, used to adjust the size, broke completely down the middle. No pressure was put on it, I merely picked it up and it broke. I am very disappointed, thus far I have had a great experience with the elite strap and to have it break so early is a real shame.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 26, 2021

one_reviews_text: Der bessere Sitz und längere Akkulaufzeit rechtfertigen den Preis meiner Meinung nach schon. Besser als eine Akku-Bastellösung. Wer ab und zu bei den WHD vorbei schaut, kann auch mal ein Schnäppchen machen. Kann je nach Anwendung die Brille jetzt ca. 3-4h durchgehend benutzen.Wie schon viele schreiben, für Dauernutzer der Quest 2 eigentlich ein Pflichtkauf.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on February 21, 2022
review_title: Besserer Sitz und längere Akkulaufzeit rechtfertigen den Preis

one_reviews_text: Avendo comprato questo originale dopo averne provato uno più economico, ho capito la differenza tra un prodotto progettato ad hoc e... tutto il resto.Alla fine, questo lo comprerete in ogni caso. Non fate il mio stesso errore, prendete direttamente questo e risparmiate i soldi che spendereste per provarne uno più economico.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on October 1, 2021
review_title: Evitate di buttare soldi su quelli più economici

one_reviews_text: This is like a cheap product, not a cardboard, but looks like a cardboard, very poor quality. The description says it has extra space for elite strap, but it won't fit your VR with the elite strap, please see my photo.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 18, 2022
review_title: Cheap made, poor quality and not fit the elite strap

one_reviews_text: I like this elite strap as it is faster to adjust - a simple twist of a knob will do. It is also gives a better fit for my younger guests who want to use the headset as they are not familiar on how to tighten the standard strap.However, I do not like the elite strap for watching movies as I cannot rest my head on my chair due to the protruding adjustment knob.
review_date: Reviewed in Singapore on September 23, 2021

one_reviews_text: this is a great item. so much easier tightening the strap with a simple twist of the back to tighten and the battery makes it last twice as long. definitely worth it if you want it to fit well all the time and if you have kids that will flog it to death.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 15, 2022

one_reviews_text: Highly recommened upgrade for the Quest 2, make it way more cormfortable to use. Build quality is alright, it does feel a bit cheap, kind of cheap plastic feeling and for $79 is a bit pricey. But for the extra comfort and support this gives, I recommend it for anyone that can't stand using the stock strap. Some have had it cracking, I haven't had any issues with it so far and hopefully I don't.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 12, 2021
review_title: Highly recommeneded upgrade for the Quest 2

one_reviews_text: Waste of money broke very easily. As my son removed the headset, the plastic head strap on the left side snapped. It was not forced in any way, I saw it happen. I would advise if you're looking for a head strap, try third-party alternatives that exploit this known weakness for a stronger, longer-lasting head strap and half the price.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on February 28, 2021

one_reviews_text: so after a few months after light use, the strap snapped in half just like all the other cases we hear, but after looking for a refund option I see the refund window closed on 31 of January.  How do I get a refund? Didn't they have a one-year warranty which even got extended to 2 years due to the snapping?
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on February 3, 2021

one_reviews_text: Está genial, ligero de buen material y rigidez para protección, un diseño minimalista y color neutro que combina con todo, no se ve muy repelente al agua (mejor no averiguarlo), también se ve delicado para la suciedad no se aún que tan fácil sea de lavar o si se recomiende hacerlo, hay un producto similar más barato (casi a la mitad del precio) pero este definitivamente me hace pensar que valió la pena el gasto,  llego antes de lo planeado (lo cual en lo personal es una molestia porque no estaba en casa y tuve que molestar al vecino para que lo recibiera)
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on December 20, 2020

one_reviews_text: Me he dejado llevar porque era marca Oculus por la cosa de que se supone que hacen una funda de calidad para proteger tus gafas VR.Decepcionado, está funda si no fuera Oculus valdría menos de 10€.Una pena.Esta mejor diseñada la caja de las Oculus Quest 2 , que está funda.50€ por esta calidad tan baja es un poco engaño.Estoy pensando en devolverla.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on May 4, 2021

one_reviews_text: Think of as mandatory if your budget extends. If you wear glasses whilst playing I'd recommend making your budget extend. I used for a couple of days without - I would buy again if it broke. This is the only accessory I would buy again and highly recommend. Instructions are too simplistic - check a video/how to online
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 24, 2021

one_reviews_text: questo cavo si disconette quando mi muovo troppo, ho anche provato un cavo da kiwi, e kiwi funziona meglio di questo! Non consiglio di comprare il link cable originale, comprate un'altra marca, Kiwi have un cavo con fibra ottica e costa 40€ rispetto a questo che costa 99€
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on May 18, 2022

one_reviews_text: Una pena que un producto con la calidad de oculus te lo vendan nuevo y parezca reacondicionado con defectos esteticos, el logo de oculus parece manchado, tiene un golpe y la cremallera parece dada de si, no lo voy a devolver ya que lo cogi con descuento y si la vuelvo a coger no me lo aplicarian. Al fin y al cabo no es un producto de decoracion pero fatal que te lo vendan como nuevo algo que ha devuelto otra persona…
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on May 18, 2022

one_reviews_text: El producto como el empaquetado es premium, se nota de calidad y la dureza, los primeros días me costó pillar el punto pero luego me resulta muy cómodo y agradable. Se nota que balancea el peso una vez vuelves a las gomas originales se hecha en falta , con el elite ganas campo de visionado y corrige aberraciones ya que está mejor sujeto a la cabeza. Si lo recomiendo aun que me duele el precio por un trozo de plástico
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 19, 2020

one_reviews_text: No se pueden abrir tanto como me gustaría. Llevo gafas y también generosa cabeza, así que no me cabe bien del todo. Me chocan las gafas con la espuma, así que tengo que poner las gafas primero dentro de las Oculus y ahí ya ponerme el headset. Sospecho que el separador de gafas (que viene con las Oculus) le está robando espacio, pero si no lo pongo no me cabrían las propias gafas en el headset...Muy caro para los 4 plásticos que son. Hay reports de defectos de fábrica por rotura. Aunque dicen que puede ser por sacárselas mal, hay gente que asegura no haberlo hecho.Le dejo 3 estrellas porque es mucho más cómoda que la correa de stock (cosa que no es difícil).
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 5, 2020
review_title: Gafas + cabezón = no me caben bien

one_reviews_text: Molto comoda per trasportare il visore però veramente tanto cara, non so quanto ne valga la penaCi sono altre alternative ma non so quando siano validi, questa lo è tantissimo però ripeto, prezzo eccessivo
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on December 2, 2021

one_reviews_text: Both arms are hard and cheap plastic, pretty disappointing for an official product. I've only used it maybe 10 times and had it stored properly, when I put it on recently both arms broke on each side. It also puts a lot of weight on your face and pulls the unit into your face, so it's not even comfortable. I'm a little annoyed there's only a 3 month return policy and no refund option.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on August 11, 2021
review_title: Brittle and breaks - only lasted 6 months

one_reviews_text: La cremallera es una absoluta basura. Es una pena porque la funda es preciosa pero literalmente la primera vez que la cerré la cremallera se rompió y no hay manera de arreglarla. Si estás pensando en comprarla, busca sobre ello en google y en absolutamente todos sitios encuentras gente que ha tenido problemas con ella. Además de que el precio tan caro es injustificado, la cremallera hace que el producto no valga para nada.Cualquier otra funda va mejor y te cuesta 30 pavos menos.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 28, 2021

one_reviews_text: Really lovely design - actually looks like an ornament when it's all zipped up and sitting on the shelf. Everything fits in nicely - would have been good if they'd incorporated a way to have the power supply connected while the unit is in storage, but as a travel case it's spot on.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 1, 2020
review_title: Beautiful design - handy even for storing around the house

one_reviews_text: Fa il suo lavoro, mantiene le promesse. Connetto Oculus Quest 2 con Legion 5 appena acquistato.tutto gira benissimo, forse il prezzo è un po' elevato. Esistono su Amazon cavi con le stesse prestazioni a prezzi decisamente + aggressivi.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on December 30, 2020
review_title: Fa il suo lavoro, un po' costosa

one_reviews_text: I bought a cheap Quest 2 headstrap to make do, which I regretted. Believe me, spend the money and get the proper one. This fits so much better and the Quest 2 even recognizes the battery as an official product. This means that instead of showing the remaining percentage as "charging" it adds the battery to the total pool, then when you finish playing you can charge both batteries with the one attachment.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on May 12, 2022
review_title: Way more comfortable and adds playtime!

one_reviews_text: Tja, schade schade Herr Nomade....Vom Tragekomfort ist das Teil um Längen besser als die normale Elite Strap Version,da der Ausgleich des Gewichts durch den Akku hinten super ist und der Komfort durch das Gummi am Hinterkopf viel besser sitzt als beim normalen Strap. Leider rastet schon nach 5 Tagen der Drehknopf nicht mehr ein und man kann diesen nicht mehr festdrehen. Somit ist das schicke 93 Euro teure Teil unbrauchbar. Wenn man schon so tief in die Tasche greifen muss, dann doch bitte für Qualität. Bitter Oculus.
review_date: Reviewed in Germany on February 5, 2022

one_reviews_text: Works well and is comfortable.You read a lot of reviews where they have broken but I think this is due to mis-use (despite people claiming otherwise).I can see if you weren't careful with these the side may snap but you'd have to be a bull in a china shop with total disregard for the product. Like cranking the water taps and wondering why the seals get damaged and wear out! `:P
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on March 24, 2021

one_reviews_text: è ottima sotto tutti i punti di vista, un accessorio fondamentale. sputerete sopra al vecchio cinturino
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on January 19, 2022

one_reviews_text: Aumenta de forma considerable la batería del casco, un par de horas más o menos, depende del uso, pero muy contento con la compra, el agarre a la cabeza es mucho más cómodo
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on May 11, 2022

one_reviews_text: I have a size 63 head. aka a big dome. The quest was impossible to use comfortably with the standard strap for more than 5 minutes. With this one, and the extra battery, I can go for an hour plus.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 19, 2021
review_title: If you have a big head, this is not optional

one_reviews_text: Más comodidad que la original, aunque no resulta imprescindible. Yo la recomendaría a todo aquel que haga bastante uso de las Oculus Quest 2. Para un uso puntual en sesiones de 30 minutos, la sujeción original es más que suficiente en mi opinión.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on January 23, 2021

one_reviews_text: Estaba pensando comprar el cable chino pero preferí adquirir el original y la verdad no me arrepiento. Se nota la calidad y resistencia del cable y los resultados con Oculus Quest 2 es fabuloso.
review_date: Reviewed in Mexico on October 13, 2021
review_title: Caro pero vale totalmente la pena

one_reviews_text: Non ha assolutamente senso la spesa, prendete pure un cavo type c to type c da 5 metri, poi si funziona benissimo ok ma si può risparmiare senza peggiorare il trasferimento dati in maniera sensibile o quanto meno “tangibile”
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on March 31, 2022

one_reviews_text: Purchased the cable about a year ago. Was working fine, but then stopped charging. Contacting Oculus revealed that the cable is not supposed to be for charging, but just for connecting Oculus to a compatible gaming PC. Beware, and if you need to charge your device as you play - look elsewhere.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 28, 2021
review_title: Don't believe the description: cable does not charge

one_reviews_text: You can see cracks like that everywhere ,  everyone complains about them cracking after a few month , dont buy that!
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on September 13, 2021

one_reviews_text: It was a good accessory at first but after about 3 mouths it had only been adjusting on the left side and there are multiple cracks in the plastic. I would say I treat my headset with good care and haven’t dropped it or hit it in anyway. Since it broke just out of the return window I am now left with nothing but 3 mouths of use from a cheap elite strap for the oculus quest 2 that cost $80.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on March 7, 2021

one_reviews_text: I have tried for 2 months to get it to work. Really expensive unusable cable. Lots of other people are having the same problem. It's either Gigabit computers or Thunderbolt ports. Either way no one seems to want to fix it. Stay away from this cable until they announce a solution but I would hold my breath. Others have been waiting for a year I found out. Even the last update didn't fix it.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on September 10, 2021

one_reviews_text: La correa es perfecta y acopla muy bien mejora  la visión pero yo la devolví. ,no soy muy de jugar  las gafas las utilizo para ver películas  y jugar a veces  entonces al estar la cabeza reposada sobre el sillón no me es cómoda. Por que se clava , y o me apetecía estar quitando y poniéndola. Pero va perfecta
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 16, 2020

one_reviews_text: Pur essendo un oggetto molto carino e di design, non è molto funzionale, la cerniera non scorre molto bene. La maniglia per il trasporto non è molto grande. Per il costo che ha, direi troppo eccessivo.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on May 25, 2021

one_reviews_text: Valigetta elegante e robusta, fatta apposta per conservare al sicuro il visore VR. Non metto 5 stelle perché lo spazio riservato per gli accessori quali cavo di connessione e caricabatterie è un po’ limitato.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on May 19, 2021

one_reviews_text: Pues efectivamente, poco más de un mes de uso y se ha rajado por un lateral tal como dicen las reseñas negativas.. El problema es que supuestamente el que yo compré estaba “revisado para que no se rompiese” Nada, todo marketing. No recomiendo la compra, no es nada barato para esta calidad
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on June 28, 2021

one_reviews_text: Pensaba que los comentarios de roturas eran por mal uso, y por eso lo compre aun conociendo los casos, pero tras poco tiempo usándolo con el máximo cuidado me han aparecido grietas. 50€ a la basura. Deplorable.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on March 26, 2021

one_reviews_text: Es imprescindible para jugar, pero es un insulto que te lo vendan como un complemento a parte cuando debería venir así de serie, pagar 50€ a parte por esto me parece una tomadura de pelo y un saca cuartos
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on March 21, 2021

one_reviews_text: Amazing cable. Tried a 3rd party cable b4 buying this. Everything is way better. The fit, the transmission, flexibility.  Made the right choice. Worth it.The delivery guy was amazing. Was not at home and he left it nice and concealed. 👍
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 30, 2021

one_reviews_text: Rendono il Quest 2 molto più comodo e bello, diventa più equilibrato e quindi più leggero, è più facile da indossare, è assolutamente necessario imho.Fate attenzione a non prendere mai il quest prendendolo dal cinturino. Prendete il quest sempre dal suo sesso corpo, altrimenti il cinturino si rompe.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on May 20, 2021

one_reviews_text: Strap broke in the first week.  Not doing anything out of the ordinary, just regular use.  Tried repairing with some musking tape.  Then 2 days later, strap broke on the other side while I was using it.  lucky I caught it as my occulus would have smashed on the ground.  Really, really cheap plastic on the straps.  Not worth the money.  Very disappointing.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on January 4, 2021

one_reviews_text: Honestly all these stuffs are expensive in India because they are not available here directly, so nothing to crib about the cost. Packing was simple, product is sturdy and amazing.Total value for money!
review_date: Reviewed in India on July 11, 2021

one_reviews_text: Works well but not sure if the price is justified haha. apparently you can get much cheaper alternatives.Apparently the price is high because it uses "optic fibres" with traces of copper - which makes it really light - I have noticed that.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on July 27, 2021

one_reviews_text: Qualità dei materiali alla pari dei competitor cinesi, scomodo, nessun supporto e soprattutto, completamente overpriced. Andate su altre alternative molto più studiate e a miglior mercato
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on May 12, 2022

one_reviews_text: Es perfecta si tienes todos los accesorios originales, si utilizas el strap de Aliexpress no te va a servir.Por lo demás, la funda es muy bonita pero tanto el tacto como la cremallera hay que cuidarlos mucho, ya que se rompen con bastante facilidad.Eso si, si tienes todo original, no se puede hacer una funda más compacta, muy bien en ese sentido.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on December 17, 2020
review_title: Buen producto, pero cuidado si no tienes todo original.

one_reviews_text: The elite strap works quite well with every head size and shape. I’m a really big guy and it works extremely well and is a lot better than the strap that comes as standard. It’s not as heavy or uncomfortable as expected but could feel pressurised with prolonged use, take a break and you’ll feel refreshed. I highly recommend this accessory.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 23, 2020

one_reviews_text: Strangely broken after just light usages(see attached photos), obviously because of its poor material used. Only after mine was broken did I find that a lot of people have complained the same issue before me. Warning to interested buyers, please do not buy or you’ll regret like me and many others.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on March 24, 2022

one_reviews_text: Nice and comfortable than stock strap however i have had 2 now and both have cracked in roughly the same area on the main frame. I've been accepted a replacement and i am just awaiting delivery however kinda annoying how the majority of them snap. It doesn't seem like "Just a bad batch" i think just faulty design and bad material used. I'm contemplating on the frankenquest which involves the HTC Vive deluxe audio strap
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on April 1, 2021

one_reviews_text: Si lo que buscas es una sujeccion tipo CV1, pues esta es la tuya.Pero son muy caras, por ese precio deberian al menos traer cascosActualizacion Feb 2022: Despues de un año se han roto

one_reviews_text: El producto no se acopla bien a la parte de atrás de la cabeza.Y a demás hace más presión que la correa original, que lejos de dar más seguridad, conlleva que te duela la cabeza.
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on March 19, 2021

one_reviews_text: Fa il suo dovere egregiamente, ma si è crepato ai lati dopo un mesetto. Ora ci ho messo il nastro adesivo, ma esteticamente è orrendo.Meglio altri prodotti più resistenti.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on September 24, 2021

one_reviews_text: It feels thin and cheaply made, I got it for 55 and I'm not sure it's even worth thatIt does what it says so I guess I can't give it less then a 3 star
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on December 29, 2021
review_title: It does the job I guess

one_reviews_text: El cable es perfecto. Solo con conectar las gafas al ordenador ya aparece el escritorio con la máxima definición y una tasa de transmisión de datos perfecta. Y 5 metros dan para mucho. Muy contento.

one_reviews_text: La plastica di questo cinturino è da vomito, non compratelo assolutamente a meno che non volete spendere 100 euro un un'HTC Audio Deluxe che sarebbe l'opzione migliore (120 euro). La plastica di questo prodotto (Oculus Pro Strap) è veramente scadente e riciclata. Il cinturino si è rotto dopo 6 mesi di utilizzo normale rischiando anche di rompere il VR.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on June 24, 2021
review_title: Plastica di bassisima qualità e riciclata.

one_reviews_text: Con este accesorio olvidate del problema de si tienes bien colodados los oculus o ves borroso por no estar bien colocados, este accesorio elimina ese problema.

one_reviews_text: Ero scettico sul prendere questo strap, ma cambia totalmente il come calza il visore.Non serve più aggiustarselo mille volte e se condividete il visore con altri, la regolazione è rapidissima.

one_reviews_text: Strap snapped after less than a year of occasional use.  Do not bother with this product.  Contacted the seller for a refund but have had no response from them so wouldn't bother with them either.

one_reviews_text: Fit much better then stuck head strap. However the material feels brittle. Buyer beware reports of many snaps, however Oculus have been very forthcoming in sending replacements under warranty - my friend had to got replacement after side bracket snapped.

one_reviews_text: Overall, it's pretty good!I've taken a star off because the zip strap could be a little easier to grab and doesn't seem as sturdy. The carry strap at the top is good, but there's no way to for it to clip on other things as it's just a strap, you have to clip other things onto it if you know what I mean, which isn't bad, but might reduce some possiblities.

one_reviews_text: Se resquebrajó solito como a los dos meses de haberlo adquirido.Tenía muy poco uso.Es material de muy mala calidad a pesar de que aparenta todo lo contrario.

one_reviews_text: Beware the positive reviews, it works fine until it breaks and then you'll wish you didn't buy it.Strap has become misaligned, wont tighten on one side so one side is always closer than the other. I have also noticed 4 different cracks have formed one is half way up the strap so it will inevitably break off completely at some point.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on July 10, 2021

one_reviews_text: Cette nouvelle sangle fait la différence par rapport aux élastiques proposés de base pour le Quest 2 toutefois il semble qu'il faille quand même serrer pas mal cette dernière pour qu'elle tienne au moins aussi bien tous les élastiques point alors certes il n'est pas question d'avoir un truc qui nous sert le visage autant que ce que proposaient les élastiques mais je comprends mieux maintenant pourquoi les commentaires disent que ça peut se casser car en effet on aurait tendance avoir envie de serrer plus la molette pour que le casque ne bouge pas... je pense donc que ça n'est clairement pas la fixation la plus adaptée

one_reviews_text: Un cable de muy alta calidad por si no quieres tener el problema de tener que estar cargando la bateria de los oculus cada 2 horas o 3 horas de juego.

one_reviews_text: 50€ por un estuche que no trae nada es una salvajada a pagar, los materiales son buenos y de calidad, pero si quieres comprar una más barata, pues hay más opciones, por 50€ no lo recomiendo ni de coña.

one_reviews_text: NON E' VERO CHE CARICA DURANTE L'UTILIZZO. Forse si scarica un po' più lentamente rispetto a quanto si scarica con il cavo più economico ma, di sicuro, NON RICARICA.
review_date: Reviewed in Italy on March 15, 2021

one_reviews_text: Before the side strap broke this was a great piece of kit that made wearing the Oculus a lot more comfortable, however, over a relatively short amount of time one of the side straps became quite brittle and snapped midway. There was also some series wear around the front connector. For the price of this accessory I expected more longevity.
review_date: Reviewed in Australia on June 17, 2021

one_reviews_text: Carisimo para ser un trozo de plastico. Ademas de la cantidad de casos que se han reportado de su fragilidad. Pero eso si, son imprescindibles con las quest 2. Mejoran mucho su usabilidad y es muy comodo
review_date: Reviewed in Spain on November 6, 2020
review_title: Caro, se rompe, pero mejoran la experiencia

one_reviews_text: Si piensas comprar soporte posterior  de cabeza o batería extra (la que haz un balance de peso muy bueno), ese estuche quedará pequeño. Eso pasó conmigo y tuve que tirarlo a la basura porque ya no cabía mi Oculus

one_reviews_text: La maschera allargata  si adatta meglio a visi ampi ottima direi, il blocco della luce discreto, non riduce l'introduzione di essa totalmente

one_reviews_text: molto piu comoda della banda originale e ti permette di giocare anche per periodi prolungati di tempo.CONSIGLIATISSIMO

one_reviews_text: He recibido perfectamente el artículo y su contenido, fácil instalación y mejora considerable en comodidad, ajustable por detrás para la presión y la banda de velcro que hace su función. Si quieres calidad, hay que pagarla, aunque haya más opciones que éste producto.

one_reviews_text: El cable es cómodo al usarlo, lamentablemente el que me mandaron fue de segunda mano y venía dañado, pues aveces pierde conexión y lamentablemente Oculus no da soporte donde vivo así que va de regreso a Amazon.

one_reviews_text: Fait exactement ce pour quoi il à été conçu, il n'a pas encore cassé après 2 semaines d'usage modéré contrairement à ce que d'autre personne ont pu rencontrer.Edit: Finalement, l'arceau a cassé le lendemain ou j'ai écrit ce commentaire. Je vais faire fonctionner la garantie.Edit 2: La sangle avais depuis été remplacé par Amazon. J'ai récemment ressortis le casque de sa house et quel ne fut pas ma surprise quand j'ai vu la sangle de nouveau cassée, plus oui moins au même endroit...

one_reviews_text: Es increíble que la correa venga PEGADA en lugar de cosida. Se cayó en la misma mesa nada más cogerla, por suerte no llegó a caer al suelo.No es de recibo esta malísima calidad en una funda de 50€
